radiographic_examinations.findings: The liver is normal without evidence of textural abnormalities or focal hepatic lesions. There is no intrahepatic biliary ductal dilatation. The gallbladder is normal without evidence of wall thickening, pericholecystic fluid, or gallbladder wall edema. There is no evidence of cholelithiasis. The CBD is normal measuring 0.2 cm. Focused ultrasound at the patient's site of pain demonstrated no abnormalities.
